posts.body:
==You now need a non self-generated certificate to post due to the spam. If you try to post without it you'll see  your own post but get a "content not distributed" error==

1. Go to ZeroID:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz/
I have no idea if it's possible for others to see the "username" you select or if that's only if they're using ZeroNet email. I'm guessing not but just in case use a username generator or otherwise pick something unrelated to any other accounts you might have.
2. Go back to a 08chan page.
2. Click and drag the top-right 0 logo to the left to reveal the menu. Go down to "Identity address (limit used: 0.00kB / 0.00kB)" and select for your new zeroid.bit address to be used with 08chan.
3. Refresh the page. You can now post.

For anyone unfamiliar.

==On the main ZeroHello page, select "Tor: Always". If it's just Tor: Enabled, it will only use it to connect to others with Tor==

posts.subject: #GamerGate + #NotYourShield [#GG + #NYS]: Certified Spam-free Edition
posts.body:
==Urgent Instructions==
==Get a certificate from a certificate provider like ZeroId and select to use it with 08chan so you can actually post.==
To get one, go to ZeroId:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1iD5ZQJMNXu43w1qLB8sfdHVKppVMduGz/
Then go back to 08chan, swipe the 0 logo in the top right to the left, and go down to "Identity address (limit used: 0.00kB / 0.00kB)". Select your new zeroid.bit address and refresh the page. If you get a "Forbidden" error there are other providers like ZeroVerse you can try (which uses proof-of-work via Bitmessage), or try to make ZeroId work with different Tor circuits or proxies and clearing cookies until it lets you.
==Set "Tor: Always" on the main ZeroHello page so your real IP isn't exposed, Daily Beast journos are trying to collect IPs:==
https://archive.fo/4vAKm
vch.moe is the other /v/ bunker

==ONGOING DISCUSSIONS:==
>8chan is down
>OHCHR updated their page to note the comments they received about how their definition of CP would end up criminalizing fiction
https://archive.fo/pu3y7 (Official responses: anonfile.com/F0O8J6d8nc/Japan_docx | /E9P1J6d2ne/JSSCC_docx | /z7p9S2t2na/USA_pdf | /1fp0S8t7n3/Austria_docx)
>Nick Rekieta started a GoFundMe for Vic Mignogna's legal fees, which has since passed its initial $100K goal and its second $200K goal
http://archive.is/OyZSy | https://archive.fo/g2FkV
www.gofundme.com/vic-kicks-back
Sony censorship master list: https://www.oneangrygamer.net/sony-ps4-censorship-policy-censored-games/
Steam censorship master list: https://www.oneangrygamer.net/steam-waifu-holocaust-2-0-banned-game-list/
>YouTube will begin a giant purge of its site to remove videos supporting white supremacy, conspiracy theories and Nazis
http://archive.is/wwKW2
>Quinnspiracy: The Incestuous Nature of Modern Game Journalism
https://nichegamer.com/2019/07/14/quinnspiracy-the-incestuous-nature-of-modern-game-journalism/ || https://archive.fo/Dp2Y5
<Tweet from the author, Sophia Narwitz: "Just got an email from a very well known and prominent figure warning me to change my ways or else. It appears this week’s editorial did get some people antsy."
https://archive.fo/mYTUz

==__CURRENT TASKS:__==
Cut for length, see the full OP on the wiki

==ONGOING TASKS:==
'''A. Support archive.fo!''' Accountability needs proof: https://liberapay.com/archiveis/donate
'''B. OP DisNod:''' Contact the FTC and advertisers about violations and unethical practices >>>/gamergatehq/328644
'''C. Internet Censorship happenings:''' Spread the word about the dangers of FOSTA/CLOUD act/Article 13, etc. >>>/gamergatehq/332324
'''D. OP End the Era:''' Dig into resetera and their connections to journos, devs, etc. >>>/gamergatehq/332315

==Reminders (important, READ THESE!):==
•Use https://archive.fo to deny sites ad revenue and traffic and preserve pages in case they are deleted later
•Be civil if you have to argue with people on Twitter, Tumblr or any forum - don't make us look like douchebags
•Do not accept requests for any goal, demand lists or personal army requests: https://pastebin.com/p5dVp1e5
•Beware COINTELPRO: The Gentleperson's Guide to Forum Spies: https://cryptome.org/2012/07/gent-forum-spies.htm
•STOP REPLYING TO BAITS AND OBVIOUS DERAILMENT ATTEMPTS, JUST REPORT AND FILTER

==Resources==
>Summaries of #GamerGate:
•https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wy9bisUIP3w - #GamerGate - If It's Not About Ethics
•https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5fnRSL3d_xU - #GamerGate in 60 Seconds

https://gitgud.io/gamergate/gamergateop/blob/master/ThreadRepository.md
https://ggwiki.deepfreeze.it/index.php?title=Thread_Repository

https://gitgud.io/gamergate/gamergateop/tree/master/How-to-Contribute

==Apparently users that haven't already downloaded them can only see threads created after the anti-spam measure was implemented, so I baked a new bread==
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
==If you normally skip the OP, read the Tor and certificate instructions==

>>bfcff6e0-f606-4314-94a5-136193ce8da1
>>f5ed4a37-700a-4ebb-be09-beb287256469
I made a new thread because apparently some people aren't seeing threads created before the anti-spam measures.

>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1
>>5c3c2936-161c-4b97-91ea-e4bd1ef958f1

Anyone here? Is everyone just at vch.moe because it's more active, or are they having problems posting? Remember that if you get an error about content not distributing that means you can see your post but nobody else can, due to needing a certificate. If you're having technical trouble you can ask in the vch.moe thread.

>>b23a16fd-5f67-41a8-aa49-94d7ab8b7e29
Yeah, I'm lurking both but it looks like they're going to be the main bunker due to the lower barrier to entry and technical issues, they're up to 4200 posts. They have IP hashing now for anyone who was scared away by that. But at least new users here can see the GG thread now.

>>9b3bd91d-b915-4b31-9dcf-57a3f45a1205
Remember to have "Tor: Always" on the main ZeroHello page and not just "Tor: Enabled". Enabled only uses Tor to talk to other Tor people, so people like that Daily Beast journo can sniff your IP unless it's "Always".

>>1d651e1c-1eb1-4bc6-8802-9b519d407929
Nice to see you. If you didn't know there's also a bunker at vch.moe set up by Mark.

==The Verge: Norway mosque shooter allegedly posted to 8chan before attack==
http://archive.is/B8yqY
They've since pulled the article, presumably because someone pointed out 8chan is down
http://archive.is/36oZS
>Note: we have taken down an earlier story about a suspected post on 8chan from an alleged shooter because it contained unverified information and did not meet our editorial standards. We regret the error. 

The fact they made this mistake means they never actually checked the source (let alone trying to verify the post was by the shooter) and just went off a completely unverified screencap they could use to attack 8chan and set the narrative as soon as possible. Reminder The Verge is the same company as Vox and Polygon.
==Just set every connection to use Tor on the main ZeroHello page so it says "Tor: Always", the default means they can harvest IPs.==

Onion link if necessary:
http://4usoivrpy52lmc4mgn2h34cmfiltslesthr56yttv2pxudd3dapqciyd.onion/

Right now it's up on clearnet via the 8ch.moe proxy, and 8chan.moe will try to redirect to 8ch.moe but complains about the certificate. Some people are having problems with the CAPTCHA through 8ch.moe, if you do try going to 8ch.moe/captcha.js or use the Tor address. It's supposed to be fully fixed Monday.
